content: this shawl pattern is written for beginner knitters as a relatively easy project encompassing stockinette garter ribbing simple lace and directional i e right and left leaning increases and decreases it is worked flat using circular needles because it is intended for a new knitter who may have limited supplies and/or abilities the pattern is written as simply as possible and includes detailed instructions and explanations it also calls for 300 grams of yarn in order to be a manageable size shawlette but more yarn can be used for a larger shawl this pattern is offered free but if you would like to donate or buy me a cup of coffee 1 i would appreciate it **materials ** * 300 grams 270-340 yards bulky weight yarn for a small to medium shawlette * can use 500-600g for a larger shawl * * us size 13 9 mm 32 circular needle * or longer * * 4 stitch markers that fit around your needles * 1 locking stitch marker also see my fundamental hat /patterns/library/fundamental-hat pattern **follow knittymelissa ** <small>ravelry knittymelissa designs group 2 </small> <small>youtube https //www youtube com/knittymelissa 3 </small> <small>instagram @knittymelissa</small> 1 https //paypal me/knittymelissa country x=us&locale x=en_us 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/knittymelissa-designs 3 https //www youtube com/knittymelissa
